name: Red and Red: War
description:
Red and Red: War is the first multiplayer game I have made or you can say I am making. It is a deathmatch game. You have to survive for as long as possible and of course, to survive, you must kill others. Have Fun!

Controls:

Arrow keys to move

Up arrow key or Space to jump

X to shoot

Enter to chat

Current Version is 0.25
